skills.name: Install GSAP
gsap.to()
gsap.from()
gsap.fromTo()
gsap.set()
Properties
Easing
Stagger
Repeat
Timeline
Position Parameter
skills.pattern:
const tl = gsap.timeline();

tl.to('.a', { x: 100 })
  .to('.b', { y: 100 }, '<')      // Same time as previous
  .to('.c', { x: 100 }, '>')      // After previous
  .to('.d', { y: 100 }, '-=0.5')  // 0.5s before end
  .to('.e', { x: 100 }, '+=0.5')  // 0.5s after end
  .to('.f', { y: 100 }, 2);       // At 2 seconds
